title: Notable & Quotable: Trump
sub_head: ‘The problem for Trump’s reelection was not that his response was too anti-lockdown and loosey-goosey. On the contrary.’
body: The problem for Trump’s reelection was not that his response was too anti-lockdown and loosey-goosey. On the contrary. It was that the lockdowns imposed were draconian enough to disfigure the economy. Covid-19 . . . subjected the country to the most plutocrat-enriching trimester in its history. Plumbers and waiters were suddenly without...
